dt-example.title: Pane Customisation
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows the activation of paging within the panes by enabling the searchPanes `-init searchPanes.dtOpts` property for `-init paging`, and setting the `-init pagingType` to `numbers`. It also enables `-init info` of the third column's pane.
The default for `-init searching` is true and `-init info` is false. This occurs on all of the panes, the `-init info` is displayed only on the second column's pane.
